German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

From Middle High German antwürte, from Old High German antwurti, from Proto-Germanic *andawurdiją. The gender change from neuter to feminine is due to semantic association with Frage (“question”).

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈantvɔʁt/
  • Audio
    		(file)
  • Audio (Austria)
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Antwort f (genitive Antwort, plural Antworten)

  1. answer
